Test Scenario: Verify login with valid email and password
Precondition: User is on Amazon Login Page
Test Steps: 1.Open Amazon website   2. Click on Login Page 3.Enter Valid Email                4 Enter Valid Password                         5.Click on Login Button
Expected Result: User should log in successfully and be taken to homepage

Test Scenario: Verify login with valid email and invalid password
Precondition: User is on Amazon Login Page
Test Steps: 1.Open Amazon website   2. Click on Login Page 3.Enter Valid Email                4 Enter inValid Password                         5.Click on Login Button
Expected Result: User get error Invalid passwrod "Enter valid password"

Test Scenario: Verify search with a valid product name
Precondition: User is logged in  and on the Amazon homepage
Test Steps:
1. Open Amazon homepage
2. Click on search bar
3. Type samsung s24
4. Press Enter
Expected Result: List of samsung s24 products should be displayed

Test Scenario: Verify adding a product to the cart
Precondition: User is logged in and product listing is visible
Test Steps:
1. Search for a product (example: “iPhone 15”)
2. Select any product from results
3. Click on the product
4. Click “Add to Cart”
Expected Result: Product should successfully appear in cart

Test Scenario: Verify removing a product from the cart
Precondition: Product is already add to cart
Test Steps:
1. Go to Cart page
2. Select any product
3. Click “Delete” or “Remove”
Expected Result: Product should be removed from the cart and cart count updated
